A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Compared to the 2nd generation of Star Wars movies Produced by George Lucas...this one at least has some humor and a story line\, albeit an hour too long and waaay to much mystical force nonsense. Half the movie seems to be an elaborate setup for the next movie...and of course the \"Last Jedi\" isn't either the last jedi or the last movie about the last jedi.
